name: I/O '17 Extended Bauchi

venue.name: Uplift Hub
venue.address_1: Uplift Hub, ( former Polycon eCenter), Adjacent Admin block, Federal Polytechnic Bauchi. Bauchi

description: Google I/O is an annual developer festival held at the outdoor Shoreline Amphitheatre Mountain View, California in May 17-19, 2017. As GDG Bauchi we wish to hold an Extended event to bring local developer communities together to experience the I/O keynotes and sessions with one another in real-time, around the globe. We will also tackle codelabs and demos during that day.

name: Cloud Meetup: Hosting Websites on Google Cloud

venue.name: Uplift Hub
venue.address_1: Uplift Hub, ( former Polycon eCenter), Adjacent Admin block, Federal Polytechnic Bauchi. Bauchi

description:
Tired of limitations on web hosting? Have you ever tried installing a custom script on your website, only to find out it's not supported by your hosting provider?

In this inaugural edition of Cloud Meetup, we will be discussing how to host websites on Google Cloud. We will be looking at the following products:

• Cloud Compute

• Cloud Storage

• Cloud DNS

• Cloud SQL

• and Persistent Disks

We will also see how you can set up a web server like apache and install a demo WordPress Website.

We look forward to seeing you, dont be late!

name: DevFest North-East 17
description: GDG DevFests are large, community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, all-day hack-a-thons, codelabs, and more. In 2017

name: Study Jams

venue.name: Uplift Hub
venue.address_1: Uplift Hub, ( former Polycon eCenter), Adjacent Admin block, Federal Polytechnic Bauchi. Bauchi

description:
Many people learn better when they learn in groups. Study Jams are community-run study groups for developers covering a range of Google Developers content. Typically, Study Jams focus on completing a course, but some may focus on mastering a skill or product area.
The Study Jams objective is to raise the technical proficiency of global community members through the highest possible course completion rate.

name: Cloud Study Jam - Bauchi

venue.name: Uplift Hub
venue.address_1: Uplift Hub, ( former Polycon eCenter), Adjacent Admin block, Federal Polytechnic Bauchi. Bauchi

description:
• What we'll do
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?
Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges. Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.

Agenda:
4:30pm: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
6:00pm: Break
6:45pm: Intro to Docker or Scientific Data Processing lab
7:30pm: Event ends

• What to bring
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

name: International Women's Day Celebration '18.

venue.name: Prof. Iya Abubakar Community Resource Centre
venue.address_1: 20 Abdulkadir Ahmed Road, commercial layout Bauchi

description:
• What we'll do
At IWD '18 Bauchi, We will be celebrating the milestone attained by Women in Technology. Keeping in mind the efforts made by women who paved the path for us and have made it a 'Cause', From Ada Lovelace to Grace Hopper and even African women changing history one code or no code at a time. We will also feature Mobile Sites Technology, Techprenuership, Networking, Introducing Non-Tech women to the new standard of tech and how to exploit it to make their lives and fields better with the help of an ever-advancing Technology and a lot more.

• What to bring
Writing materials, Laptops(Optional).

• Important to know
Register here: https://goo.gl/forms/dlDTpPQECqbjyool2

name: FIREBASE ANDROID CODELAB

venue.name: Uplift Hub
venue.address_1: Uplift Hub, ( former Polycon eCenter), Adjacent Admin block, Federal Polytechnic Bauchi. Bauchi

description:
•What we’ll learn
we'll learn how to use the Firebase platform to create Android applications. also, we will implement a chat client and monitor its performance using Firebase.

•What you need
Laptop (Optional).
Android Studio version 2.1+.
Sample code.
A test device with Android 2.3+ and Google Play services 9.8 or later, or an Emulator with Google Play services 9.8 or later.
Google app version 6.6+
If using a device, a connection cable.

description: Flutter Study Jams are Community-run study groups based on the Flutter Udacity Course. Participants learn how to use Flutter to develop high-quality, interactive mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

name: DevFest 2018
description: GDG DevFest 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more!

name: Actions on Google
description: We will work on "Google Actions"(software applications) and Dialog Flow that will run via Google Assistant on devices such as the Google Home smart speaker and the Google Pixel smartphone. We will also have access to Actions for Google toolkits, tutorials.
